Infrigidate.display_help: Fires a frigid beam of cold at a single target. This beam dramatically reduces the target's attack rate, movement speed and Defense. Infrigidate draws so much heat out of the target that the damage of any of its Fire attacks will be reduced. Recharge: Slow
Infrigidate.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage have been reduced

Ice_Shield.display_help: Casts a rock hard Ice Shield on one of your allies and grants him Defense to Melee, Lethal and Smashing attacks and damage resistance to Cold and Fire damage. You cannot stack multiple Ice Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Glacial Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Ice_Shield.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Melee, Smash, Lethal), Res(Cold, Fire)
Ice_Shield.display_target_help: You now have greater Defense to Melee, Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.
Ice_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Melee, Smashing and Lethal attacks and increase their Resistance to Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Ice_Shield.display_victim_hit: You now have greater Defense to Melee, Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.

Snow_Storm.display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.display_target_help: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
Snow_Storm.display_attacker_hit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Glacial_Shield.display_help: Envelopes an ally in gleaming Glacial Ice. Its crystalline structure has refracting properties that grants the target good Defense against Area Effect, Ranged, Energy and Negative Energy attacks. Glacial Shield also grants the target some damage resistance to Cold. You cannot stack multiple Glacial Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Ice Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Glacial_Shield.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Ranged, AoE, Energy, Negative), Res(Cold)
Glacial_Shield.display_target_help: You now have greater Defense to Area of Effect, Ranged, Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.
Glacial_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Ranged, Area of Effect, Energy and Negative Energy attacks and increase their Resistance to Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Glacial_Shield.display_victim_hit: You now have greater Defense to Ranged, Area of Effect, Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.

Frostwork.display_help: Covers an ally in a thick layer of Frost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your ally's maximum Hit Points for a short time. Frostwork also grants your ally resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Frostwork.display_target_help: Your maximum health is increased and you have some resistance to toxic damage.
Frostwork.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases the maximum Hit Points of {PlayerDest} and grants them some resistance to Toxic damage.
Frostwork.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has increases your maximum Hit Points and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Arctic_Fog.display_help: Your mastery of Cold allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within thick Arctic Fog. Arctic Fog makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense to area effect, melee and ranged attacks, as well as your resistance to Slow, Fire, Cold, and Energy damage. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Arctic Fog. Recharge: Slow
Arctic_Fog.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Slow)
Arctic_Fog.display_target_help: The Arctic Fog is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Slow.

Benumb.display_help: Numbs a single target to its very core. Benumb reduces the target's core body temperature, dramatically weakening him. A Benumbed target's Damage and Regeneration Rate are greatly reduced. Additionally, the affected target's secondary power effects are all weakened. The target's power effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened. Recharge: Long
Benumb.display_target_help: Your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects have all been reduced.
Benumb.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects of {PlayerDest}.
Benumb.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects.

Sleet.display_help: Summons a Sleet Storm at a targeted location. Sleet deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Sleet.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold), Foe -Speed, -Recharge, -DEF, -Res (All), Knockdown
Sleet.display_target_help: The Sleet is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your defense, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

Heat_Loss.display_help: Heat Loss drains the heat from your enemies and transfers that energy to your allies in the form of Endurance. All foes near the selected target may experience a Heat Loss, which will drain their Endurance, Slow them, and reduce their Damage Resistance. Allies near the target are granted Endurance and a boost to their Recovery. Some Endurance and Recovery will also be transferred directly to you and any allies near you. Recharge: Long

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit, damage and regeneration rate are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your chance to hit, Damage potential, and regeneration rate.
Twilight_Grasp.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} reducing their damage and chance to hit and healing you and your allies!
Twilight_Grasp.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} reducing your damage output and chance to hit!

Tar_Patch.display_help: Drops a large patch of viscous Negative Energy which dramatically slows down enemies that run through it and reduces their damage resistance. Affected targets stuck in the Tar Patch cannot jump or fly. Recharge: Slow
Tar_Patch.display_target_help: Your Running speed and damage resistance is reduced by the Tar Patch. You cannot jump or fly away while in the Tar Patch

Darkest_Night.display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. While Darkest Night is active the target, and all foes nearby, will have their chance to hit and Damage potential reduced as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the chance to hit and damage of {PlayerDest}.
Darkest_Night.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your chance to hit and damage with his {PowerName}.

Howling_Twilight.display_help: Activating this power channels the power of the Netherworld to weaken your foes, in an attempt to revive all nearby fallen allies. You must stand near your defeated allies to revive them, then select a foe. The selected foe and all nearby foes will be Slowed, Disoriented, have their Regeneration rate reduced and drained of some life. Revived allies will have full Hit Points and Endurance and will be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Howling_Twilight.display_short_help: Ranged (AoE), Minor DMG(Negative), Target Slow, -Recharge, -Regen, Disorient, Ally Rez
Howling_Twilight.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Howling Twilight.
Howling_Twilight.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the attack rate and movement speed of {PlayerDest}.

Shadow_Fall.display_help: Envelops you and your nearby teammates in a shroud of darkness. Shadow Fall does not grant Invisibility, but it does make you harder to detect. Even if you are discovered, Shadow Fall grants a bonus to Defense bonus to all attacks and Resistance to Fear, while reducing Energy, Negative Energy, and Psionic Damage. You cannot use any other Concealment type power while using Shadow Fall. Recharge: Slow
Shadow_Fall.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF(All), +Res(Energy, Negative, Psionics, Fear)
Shadow_Fall.display_target_help: Shadow Fall has made you difficult to detect, which increases your Defense. Shadowfall also partially absorbs and deflects Energy, Negative Energy and Psionic damage. You are also less fearful.
Shadow_Fall.display_victim_hit: You are hidden within the Shadow Fall.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably, attacking only when attacked and even then with a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Black_Hole.display_help: Opens up a Black Hole to the Netherworld that temporarily pulls in all foes within its grasp. The victims become phase shifted and are completely intangible. They are hard to see, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space. Recharge: Slow
Black_Hole.display_target_help: You have been sucked into a Black Hole. You cannot affect or be affected by anyone in your vicinity.

Dark_Servant.display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
Dark_Servant.display_short_help: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

Siphon_Energy.display_help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Absorb_Pain.display_help: Dramatically heals an ally's wounds. This power has only a tiny Endurance cost, but it requires you to sacrifice some of your Hit Points. Absorbing someone's pain can be quite dramatic, and afterwards you will be briefly unable to heal your own wounds by any means. Recharge: Slow
Absorb_Pain.display_short_help: Ally Strong Heal, Self Moderate DMG(Special)

Resurrect.display_help: Resurrects a fallen ally with full Hit Points and Endurance. The Resurrected target is left protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Resurrect.display_target_help: You have been Resurrected. You are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Resurrect.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have full Health and Endurance. Do you Accept?

Clear_Mind.display_help: Frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, grants target clearer Perception to see hidden foes. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Clear_Mind.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
Clear_Mind.display_target_help: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Clear_Mind.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Clear_Mind.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

Fortitude.display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's chance to hit, Damage, and Defense to all attacks. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.display_target_help: You have been given the gift of Fortitude. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks have all been increased.
Fortitude.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the To Hit, Damage and Defense of {PlayerDest}.
Fortitude.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

Recovery_Aura.display_help: The Recovery Aura dramatically increases the Endurance recovery rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Recovery_Aura.display_target_help: The Recovery Aura is improving your Endurance Recovery Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Recovery_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Endurance Recovery of {PlayerDest}.

Regeneration_Aura.display_help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Regeneration_Aura.display_target_help: The Regeneration Aura is improving your Healing Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Regeneration_Aura.display_attacker_hit: You increase the Hit Point Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.

Adrenalin_Boost.display_help: Dramatically increases an ally's Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate for 90 seconds. Also grants the target high resistance to slow effects. Recharge: Very Long
Adrenalin_Boost.display_target_help: The Adrenalin Boost has stimulated your system. Your Endurance recovery, Healing rate and Attack speeds are all increased and you are resistant to slow effects.
Adrenalin_Boost.display_attacker_hit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.
Adrenalin_Boost.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of almost any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow
Personal_Force_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks, but you can only cast powers on yourself while the Force Field is active.

Deflection_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal and all Melee attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. You cannot stack multiple Deflection Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Deflection_Shield.display_target_help: You have been encased in a Deflection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Deflection_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks, as well as Toxic Damage, with your {PowerName}.
Deflection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks with a {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Force_Bolt.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Insulation_Shield.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Ranged and AoE attacks for a limited time. The Insulation also protects the target from Endurance Draining effects. You cannot stack multiple Insulation Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Deflection Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Insulation_Shield.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, Ranged, AoE), Res (End Drain)
Insulation_Shield.display_target_help: The Insulation Shield is improving your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Ranged and AoE attacks. The Insulation Shield also protects you from Endurance Draining effects.
Insulation_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from fire, cold, energy, negative energy, ranged and AoE attacks with your {PowerName}.
Insulation_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from fire, cold, energy, negative energy, ranged and AoE attacks with a {PowerName}.

Refraction_Shield.display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid their allies. The target can, however, use powers on themselves. Recharge: Slow
Refraction_Shield.display_target_help: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attack types. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses to all attacks and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from all damage types with your {PowerName}.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all damage types with a {PowerName}.

Repulsion_Field.display_help: This Toggle power creates a field that violently repels nearby foes. Each villain that is repelled costs you additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Repulsion_Field.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself with your {PowerName}, and will knock down any villain that approaches you.

Repulsion_Bomb.display_help: A powerful Repulsion Bomb is hurled at your foes dealing a moderate amount of damage and knocking them off of their feet. Foes struck by Repulsion Bomb have a good chance to become disoriented. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Repulsion_Bomb.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient

Force_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, this power keeps all foes at bay, protecting all allies inside from melee or short ranged attacks. More powerful foes may be able to penetrate the Force Bubble, but may slip and get knocked down and forced back if they try. Recharge: Slow
Force_Bubble.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} keeps your foes at bay.

Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Power.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing his damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and improves your damage potential!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} weakening you and empowering them!

Repel.display_help: Repel creates a zone of kinetic energy that violently repels nearby foes. Each foe that is repelled costs additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Repel.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself with your {PowerName}, and will knock down any foe that approaches you.

Siphon_Speed.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing his movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.
Siphon_Speed.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has slowed the attack and movement speed of {PlayerDest} while increasing your own!
Siphon_Speed.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with {PowerName} decreasing your attack and movement speed!

Increase_Density.display_help: Increases an ally's mass, freeing him from any Disorient, Immobilization, or Hold effects and leaving him resistant to such effects for a while. Increase Density also protects the target from Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleportation, as well as Smashing and Energy damage. Because the target grows more dense, their movement speed is Slowed. Although the Damage Resistance and slowing effect will not stack with multiple applications, the rest of the effects of Increase Density will. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
Increase_Density.display_target_help: Your Resistance to Smashing and Energy attacks has been increased. You are more resistant to Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleport attacks, but your movement rates are slightly reduced.
Increase_Density.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Holds, Immobilization, Disorient, Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleportation, as well as smashing and energy damage with your {PowerName} power.
Increase_Density.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protect you from Holds, Immobilization, Disorient, Knockback, Repel, and enemy Teleportation, as well as smashing and energy damage

Speed_Boost.display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Speed_Boost.display_target_help: You've been granted a Speed Boost. Your Attack speed, Endurance recovery and Running speed are all increased and you are resistant to Slow effects.
Speed_Boost.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest}, greatly increasing their movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery!
Speed_Boost.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} improves your movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery with an extra {PowerName}!

Inertial_Reduction.display_help: You can reduce your Inertia, along with that of all nearby allies. The affected allies can then jump incredible distances for a while. Recharge: Long
Inertial_Reduction.display_target_help: Your inertia has been reduced, allowing you to make incredible leaps.
Inertial_Reduction.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} allows you to jump incredible distances!
Inertial_Reduction.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your inertia temporarily, allowing you to jump incredible distances!

Transference.display_help: Transference drains an enemy of some of their Endurance and transfers that Endurance to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transference to recover Endurance for yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Slow

Fulcrum_Shift.display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, you, and those near you. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power you and your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Corrosive_Sap.display_help: You spray a target with toxic, corrosive Enzymes reducing the damage they deal as well as their damage resistance. Recharge: Slow
Corrosive_Sap.display_target_help: Your damage dealt and damage resistance have been reduced by the Corrosive Enzymes!
Corrosive_Sap.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has reduced {PlayerDest}'s resistances and damage output.
Corrosive_Sap.display_victim_hit: Your damage dealt and resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Regrowth.display_help: By channeling the energies present in nature you are able to immediately heal yourself and allies in front of you for a small amount of health and cause them to recover a small amount of health over time. Regrowth places a stack of Bloom on its target. NOTE: When used in a PvP zone Regrowth will apply a moderate regeneration effect instead of a heal over time. Recharge: Moderate
Regrowth.display_short_help: Ranged Facing Cone, Minor Ally Heal, Ally Moderate Healing Over Time, +1 Bloom
Regrowth.display_target_help: The Regrowth effect is causing you to recover a small amount of hit points over time.

Wild_Growth.display_help: You channel the power of nature into your allies allowing them to more easily shrug off damage and causing their wounds to heal more quickly. Wild Growth increases the damage resistance and boosts the regeneration rate of all affected allies. This power also grants 2 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Growth.display_target_help: Your damage resistance and regeneration rate has been increased by Wild Growth!
Wild_Growth.display_attacker_hit: You imbue your allies with the power of nature increasing their damage resistance and regeneration rate.
Wild_Growth.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage resistance and regeneration rate moderately with their {PowerName}!

Spore_Cloud.display_help: You create a large cloud of toxic spores around your targeted foe. The target and all nearby foes will have their damage output, chance to hit and regeneration rate reduced. Recharge: Long
Spore_Cloud.display_target_help: The Spore Cloud is reducing your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate!
Spore_Cloud.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and all nearby foes.
Spore_Cloud.display_victim_hit: You have been weakened by a {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}, decreasing your chance to hit, damage and regeneration.

Lifegiving_Spores.display_help: When activating this power you cause all allies at a selected location to recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds as long as they remain within the Lifegiving Spores. Recharge: Very Fast
Lifegiving_Spores.display_short_help: Toggle (Location AoE), PBAoE +Minor Heal Over Time, +Endurance
Lifegiving_Spores.display_target_help: While you stand within the Lifegiving Spores you will recover a small amount of health and endurance every few seconds.

Wild_Bastion.display_help: You encase yourself and nearby allies in a protective barrier that will absorb a moderate amount of damage. Additionally, affected allies will heal for a portion of their health over time. Wild Bastion places 3 stacks of Bloom on all affected targets. Recharge: Very Long
Wild_Bastion.display_attacker_hit: You shield nearby allies in your {PowerName} granting them a measure of damage absorption and causing them to heal over time.
Wild_Bastion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} infuses you with nature's power granting you a measure of damage absorption and causing you to heal over time.

Rebirth.display_help: Rebirth can either greatly heal a conscious ally for a large amount of health over time or it can revive a fallen ally with a large amount of health and endurance and cause them to recover health over time. This power also grants 3 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Rebirth.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally Rez, +Heal Over Time, Special, +3 Bloom
Rebirth.display_target_help: You have been revived and are recovering health over time.
Rebirth.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have partial Health and Endurance and recover health over a short period of time. Do you Accept?

Raging_Tempest.display_help: While this power is active there is a high chance that entangling vines will grasp nearby foes and render them held for a short time. Recharge: Fast.
Raging_Tempest.display_target_help: Standing in the Entangling Aura can render you held.
Raging_Tempest.display_attacker_hit: You surround yourself in a Entangling Aura. Enemies who get too close may be held.

Overgrowth.display_help: Becoming a conduit of nature itself, you greatly boost the damage, to hit and endurance discount of nearby allies for a long period of time. Overgrowth also grants the affected targets 5 stacks of Bloom. Recharge: Very Long
Overgrowth.display_target_help: Overgrowth has greatly increased your damage, chance to hit and also granted you an endurance cost discount.
Overgrowth.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the damage output, chance to hit of nearby allies as well as granting them an endurance cost discount for a short time.
Overgrowth.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your damage, chance to hit and grants you an endurance discount.

Nullify_Pain.display_help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Soothe.display_help: You heal an ally by numbing their pain and calming their mind. You cannot use this power on yourself.

Share_Pain.display_help: Share Pain draws away some of an ally's anguish caused by their wounds, but damages the user. The pain caused by this power causes the user to go into a frenzy, briefly increasing their damage output, however the user cannot be healed and will have their regeneration rate greatly diminished for a short time.
Share_Pain.display_short_help: Ally Strong Heal, Self Moderate DMG(Special), +DMG
Share_Pain.display_target_help: Your damage has been boosted by tapping into an ally's anguish. Additionally you cannot be healed or recover hit points for a short time.

Conduit_of_Pain.display_help: You revive a fallen ally by becoming a Conduit of Pain and transferring the pain that was inflicted upon them back upon your enemies. This will briefly empower you increasing your damage output, recovery rate, attack rate and chance to hit. After a minute the effect will wear off leaving you weakened for 30 seconds. Your damage, attack rate and chance to hit will all be reduced during this period. Recharge: Very Long.
Conduit_of_Pain.display_target_help: The target of this power has been resurrected and they will have XP Debt Protection for 90 seconds. The caster of this power will have their damage, chance to hit, recovery rate and recharge substantially boosted for a short time.
Conduit_of_Pain.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have full Health and Endurance. Do you Accept?

Enforced_Morale.display_help: Enforced Morale frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, Enforced Morale grants the target clearer Perception to see hidden foes, and a minor recharge and movement speed boost. The Protection and Movement boosts will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level, although the Recharge and Movement boosts will only apply for the first few applications. If the ally is not damaged, Enforced Morale will cause them some pain before granting its benefits. Recharge: Fast
Enforced_Morale.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception, +Recharge, +Speed, Minor DMG
Enforced_Morale.display_target_help: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Enforced_Morale.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Enforced_Morale.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

Soothing_Aura.display_help: While this power is active all nearby allies will be healed by Soothing Aura every couple of seconds for a small portion of their health. (NOTE: While on PvP maps this power will grant affected targets a regeneration effect instead of a periodic heal.)
Soothing_Aura.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Minor Periodic Heal
Soothing_Aura.display_target_help: You are standing within a Soothing Aura, you will periodically recovery health.

World_of_Pain.display_help: When this power is activated the user and all nearby team members will gain a moderate damage, resistance, and To Hit bonus. Additionally those affected by this power will also be protected from Placate effects.
World_of_Pain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, damage resistance, damage output is increased. Additionally your resistance to Placate is increased.
World_of_Pain.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output.
World_of_Pain.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, damage resistance, Placate protection and damage output with their {PowerName}!

Anguishing_Cry.display_help: You let out an Anguishing Cry causing a great deal of pain in your foes reducing their resistance and defense to damage for a short time.
Anguishing_Cry.display_target_help: Your resistance and defense has been reduced by the Anguishing Cry.
Anguishing_Cry.display_attacker_hit: You let out an {PowerName} reducing the defense and resistance of {PlayerDest}!
Anguishing_Cry.display_victim_hit: The harsh sound of {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} rings in your ears reducing your resistance and defense!

Painbringer.display_help: You transform an ally to pain incarnate turning them into an inexhaustible killing machine. While the character is imbued with this power they will benefit from incredible health regeneration, endurance recovery and improved damage potential for a short time.
Painbringer.display_target_help: You have been inspired to inflict a great deal of pain. Your regeneration, recovery and damage have been greatly increased!
Painbringer.display_attacker_hit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output
Painbringer.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and damage output.

Alkaloid.display_help: When used correctly, poisons can be used to heal, as well as harm. Alkaloid consists of just the right amount of amino acids to safely heal a single targeted ally. The healed target is also left with some resistance to Toxic Damage (This Toxic Damage Resistance cannot be Enhanced). You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Envenom.display_help: You Envenom your foe with a nasty poison, the poison then spreads to nearby foes. The toxin directly attacks the immune system, reducing the affected target's Defense, Damage Resistance and Hit Point Regeneration Rate. The poison is so potent, that the target actually responds less to Healing while affected by the poison. Secondary foes struck by this power will have a lesser effect placed on them while the primary target receives the full effectiveness of the power. Recharge: Slow
Envenom.display_target_help: Your Defense, Damage Resistances and Regeneration have been reduced. You also Heal less from Heal powers.
Envenom.display_attacker_hit: You Envenom {PlayerDest} and reduced their Defense and Damage Resistance and Regeneration.
Envenom.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense, Damage Resistance and Regeneration with their {PowerName}!

Weaken.display_help: You poison a single foe with a venom that significantly Weakens their strength and and that of nearby foes. The affected primary target's chance to hit and Damage output is severely reduced Additionally, the affected targets secondary power effects are all weakened. The targets power effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened. Secondary foes struck by this power will have a lesser effect placed on them while the primary target receives the full effectiveness of the power. Recharge: Long
Weaken.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Damage potential and power effects have all been reduced.
Weaken.display_attacker_hit: You Weaken {PlayerDest} and reduce their chance to hit, damage and power effects.
Weaken.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your chance to hit, Damage and power effects with their {PowerName}!

Neurotoxic_Breath.display_help: You can breath a cone of Neurotoxin gas that quickly start to anesthetize any nearby foes. Affected targets may choke on the gas as their movement and attack rate are severely reduced. Recharge: Slow
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_target_help: You are choking on Neurotoxic gas. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Neurotoxic_Breath.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Elixir_of_Life.display_help: With this Elixir, you can revive a fallen ally and turn him into a killing machine. The revived target has increased damage, chance to hit, Endurance recovery, and attack speed, and gains a resistance to Toxic damage. A brew of this sort is not without its side effects. The revived target will soon become very sick and severely weak after about 90 seconds. All effects of the Elixir will eventually wear off. Elixir of Life can only be used on Players. Recharge: Very Long
Elixir_of_Life.display_target_help: Your have been saved by the Elixir of Life. Your chance to hit and attack rate are improved. Your damage and Endurance recovery are increased as well and you gain a resistance to Toxic damage. You are also protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. The experience is taxing however, and you will soon weaken when all of the effects of the Elixir wear off.
Elixir_of_Life.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have full Health and Endurance and be extremely powerful for a while, but will weaken after 90 seconds. Do you Accept?

Antidote.display_help: This Antidote can free an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Slow, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. The Antidote also grants the target some resistance to Cold and Toxic damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Antidote.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Slow, Cold, Toxic)
Antidote.display_target_help: The Antidote has granted you temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse and Fear and Immobilize effects and your resistance to Toxic and Cold Damage is improved.
Antidote.display_target_short_help: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Slow, Cold, Toxic)
Antidote.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects as well as Toxic and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Antidote.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and improves your resistance to Toxic and Cold Damage.

Paralytic_Poison.display_help: This Paralytic Poison viciously attacks a foe's nervous system and can leave an affected target completely Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Paralytic_Poison.display_target_help: The Paralytic Poison has left you completely Held and defenseless!
Paralytic_Poison.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Paralytic Poison.

Poison_Trap.display_help: You can build a Poison Trap on the ground. Any foes that pass near the Poison Trap will cause it to detonate and release its toxic vapors. The poison is a highly toxic nerve gas, and any foes in the affected area may be drained of much of their Endurance and quickly Held or begin choking while suffering a minor amount of Toxic damage over time. The trap is almost impossible to detect, but it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Trap will detonate. Recharge: Long
Poison_Trap.display_short_help: Place Trap: PBAoE Foe Hold, -END, -Recovery, Chance to Hold, Minor DoT(Toxic)

Venomous_Gas.display_help: You surround yourself in a cloud of toxic vapors that significantly weaken any enemies that get near you. Affected foes have their defense, damage resistance, damage and chance to hit reduced moderately. Recharge: Moderate

Radiant_Aura.display_help: You can use Radiant Aura to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Radiation_Infection.display_help: Infects a targeted foe with deadly radiation, severely reducing his Accuracy and Defense. All foes that come near the target will also become infected. The Radiation Infection will last until you deactivate it, or until the original target is defeated. Recharge: Moderate
Radiation_Infection.display_target_help: The Radiation Infection has reduced your Defense and chance to hit.
Radiation_Infection.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces the defenses and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all nearby enemies!
Radiation_Infection.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your defenses and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Accelerate_Metabolism.display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance recovery, and damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected allies' metabolisms are increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain. Recharge: Very Long
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_target_help: Your metabolism has been boosted. Your movement speed and attack rate are improved. Your damage and Endurance recovery are increased as well. Lastly, you are resistant to Sleep, Mez, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_attacker_hit: You begin to accelerate your metabolism, and the metabolism of all nearby allies.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your damage, speed, recharge, recovery and resistance to status effects with {PowerName}.

Enervating_Field.display_help: While this power is active, you irradiate a targeted foe, and all foes nearby, with a deadly dose of radiation. This radiation weakens exposed targets, decreasing the damage of their attacks. It also significantly weakens their resistance, so they will take much more damage from other attacks. Recharge: Moderate
Enervating_Field.display_target_help: Your Damage potential and Resistances have been reduced.
Enervating_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.
Enervating_Field.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential and resistances with their {PowerName}

Mutation.display_help: Using a concentrated burst of radiation, you can revive a fallen ally and Mutate them into a killing machine. The Mutated target has increased damage, chance to hit, Endurance recovery, and attack speed and is protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. The entire experience is very taxing on your ally, and they will soon be severely weakened. All effects of the Mutation will eventually wear off. Recharge: Very Long
Mutation.display_target_help: Your have been mutated. Your chance to hit and attack rate are improved. Your damage and Endurance recovery are increased as well. You are also protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. The experience is taxing however, and you will soon weaken when all of the effects of this mutation wear off.
Mutation.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect and Mutate you. You will have full Health and Endurance and be extremely powerful for a while, but will weaken after 90 seconds. Do you Accept?

Lingering_Radiation.display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Lingering_Radiation.display_target_help: Your Attack rate, Running speed, and Regeneration rate have been reduced by the Lingering Radiation.
Lingering_Radiation.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} Slows all nearby foes and reduces their regeneration.
Lingering_Radiation.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} slows you and reduces your regeneration rate with their {PowerName}!

Choking_Cloud.display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Choking_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

Fallout.display_help: After an ally falls in battle, you can activate this power to extract the energy from their body to deal a massive amount of Energy damage to any nearby foes. All affected foes are extremely weakened by the Fallout, and their Accuracy, Defense, Damage and Damage Resistance is severely reduced. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Fallout.display_short_help: Post-Defeat: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe -To Hit, -DEF, -DMG, -Res(All)

EM_Pulse.display_help: You can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will drain the Endurance, and HP Regeneration of all affected targets and leave them incapacitate and Held for a long while. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EM_Pulse.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Hold, -END, -Regen, Special vs. Robots; Self -Recovery
EM_Pulse.display_target_help: You are Held by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.
Sonic_Siphon.display_victim_hit: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.display_target_help: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
Sonic_Barrier.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Barrier.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Haven.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Havens on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Barrier. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Haven.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)
Sonic_Haven.display_target_help: The Sonic Haven has increased your resistances to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage.
Sonic_Haven.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Haven.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Cage.display_help: Encases the target in an impenetrable field of sonic waves. The target cannot attack or be attacked. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic_Cage.display_target_help: You have been enveloped in a Sonic Cage. You cannot be harmed, but you can only use powers which affect you.

Disruption_Field.display_help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
Disruption_Field.display_target_help: The Disruption Field creates an area around a target ally which reduces the Resistance of all foes near them.

Sonic_Dispersion.display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All DMG except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_help: The Sonic Dispersion field is granting you Resistance to all types of damage, except psionic, as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Repulsion.display_help: You create a powerful sonic resonance around an ally, repelling all foes nearby. You will lose endurance for each target repelled. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic_Repulsion.display_short_help: Toggle: Ranged (Target Ally AoE), Foe Knockback
Sonic_Repulsion.display_target_help: A sonic resonance envelops you, repelling all foes who attempt to get near you.
Sonic_Repulsion.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Clarity.display_help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects, and leave them resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally's enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
Clarity.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confusion), +Perception
Clarity.display_target_help: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and improves your perception.
Clarity.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and improve his Perception.
Clarity.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and improves your perception.

Liquefy.display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe Knockback, Hold, -To Hit, -DEF
Liquefy.display_target_help: The ground beneath you has been liquefied! You are stuck in sludge and taking minor damage. Your chance to hit Defense and movement rates are reduced.

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

O2_Boost.display_help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing their wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects as well as increase perception. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
O2_Boost.display_target_help: The O2 Boost has improved your resistance to Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects.

Snow_Storm.display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.display_target_help: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The Torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
Snow_Storm.display_attacker_hit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Snow_Storm.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} calls forth a {PowerName} which surrounds you reducing the attack and movement speed of you and your nearby allies!

Steamy_Mist.display_help: Your mastery of the elements allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within a Steamy Mist. Steamy Mist makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense bonus to all attacks, while reducing Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as your Foes ability to Confuse you. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow
Steamy_Mist.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF(All), +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Confuse)
Steamy_Mist.display_target_help: The Steamy Mist is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Confuse.
Steamy_Mist.display_victim_hit: You are hidden within the Steamy Mist.

Freezing_Rain.display_help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Freezing_Rain.display_target_help: The Freezing Rain is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your defense, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

Hurricane.display_help: You can summon a Hurricane. The wind and rain from this massive storm reduces the range and chance to hit of nearby foes. The massive winds of this storm continuously force foes away from you. Recharge: Slow
Hurricane.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Foe -Range, -To Hit, Repel, Knockback
Hurricane.display_target_help: Hurricane Force winds are reducing the visual range and chance to hit of all enemies around the Storm Summoner!
Hurricane.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the range and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Thunder_Clap.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow
Thunder_Clap.display_target_help: The Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

Tornado.display_help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.display_short_help: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: You can create a massive Lightning Storm that will strike any foe that approaches you. Lightning from this storm can knock down and damage all nearby foes, and can even instill panic. Lightning bolts will continue to fall as long as the storm remains. Recharge: Long
Lightning_Storm.display_short_help: Create Storm: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End

Warmth.display_help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

Fire_Shield.display_help: Casts a Fire Shield on one of your allies and grants him damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. You cannot stack multiple Fire Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Plasma Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Fire_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal, Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Fire_Shield.display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, and Cold damage.

Cauterize.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Plasma_Shield.display_help: Envelope an ally in pure plasma. The Plasma Shield gives your ally resistance to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage. You cannot stack multiple Plasma Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Fire Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Plasma_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Energy, Negative Energy and Fire Damage with your {PowerName}.
Plasma_Shield.display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage.

Power_of_the_Phoenix.display_help: Revives a fallen ally. The fiery resurrection blasts nearby foes with an explosion and knocks them down and Disorients them. Your ally will revive with most of their Hit Points and Endurance. He will also be invulnerable for a brief time, as well as protected from XPDebt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Power_of_the_Phoenix.display_target_help: You have risen from the ashes. You are untouchable for 15 seconds and are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Power_of_the_Phoenix.display_attacker_hit: You rise {PlayerDest} from the ashes with the power of the Phoenix.
Power_of_the_Phoenix.display_victim_hit: You rise from the ashes with the Power of the Phoenix.
Power_of_the_Phoenix.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have full Health and Endurance. Do you Accept?

Thaw.display_help: Warms an ally and frees him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Slow, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Thaw also grants the target some resistance to Cold damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Thaw.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.display_target_help: You have been Thawed. You now have temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear and slow effects and your resistance to Cold is improved.
Thaw.display_target_short_help: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Thaw.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilize effects.

Forge.display_help: Forge a single ally target into a killing machine. Forge immensely enhances a single ally's Damage and chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Forge.display_target_help: You have been Forged into a killing machine. Your Damage and chance to hit have been increased.
Forge.display_attacker_hit: You greatly increase the Damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest}.
Forge.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage and chance to hit.

Heat_Exhaustion.display_help: Overwhelm a single foe with waves of exhausting heat. The initial effect will drain the target of some Endurance, but the heat is so overwhelming that the affected target will be weakened. His Damage output, Endurance Recovery and Hit Point Regeneration will all be reduced. Recharge: Long
Heat_Exhaustion.display_target_help: Your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration have been reduced.
Heat_Exhaustion.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.
Heat_Exhaustion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration.

Melt_Armor.display_help: The searing heat from this power is enough to melt the armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long
Melt_Armor.display_target_help: Your Defense and Damage Resistances have been reduced.
Melt_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense and Damage Resistance.

Time_Crawl.display_help: You're able to dramatically slow the time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Crawl.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced

Temporal_Mending.display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Temporal_Mending.display_short_help: PBAoE, Ally +Heal, Heal Over Time, +Res(Slow, Regen Debuff)

Times_Juncture.display_help: You create a time dilation field around you causing enemies who get too close to be slowed to a crawl, their movement speed, damage and chance to hit will be decreased substantially. Enemies affected by Delayed have these affects increased. Recharge: Slow
Times_Juncture.display_target_help: The flow of time has been dramatically slowed around the foe using Time's Juncture reducing your damage, speed and chance to hit.
Times_Juncture.display_attacker_hit: You reduce the damage, movement speed and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Times_Juncture.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage, speed and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

Temporal_Selection.display_help: You distort time around an ally, selecting a period of time where their abilities are at their highest. Their damage, attack rate and regeneration rates are dramatically increased for a brief period. This power places the Accelerated effect on the target. While this is in effect, the target has any healing and healing over time effects from Temporal Mending or Chrono Shift significantly increased. Recharge: Very Long
Temporal_Selection.display_target_help: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and regeneration.
Temporal_Selection.display_attacker_hit: You significantly increase {PlayerDest}'s damage, recharge rate and regeneration for a short time.
Temporal_Selection.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage, Recharge Rate and Regeneration.

Distortion_Field.display_help: You can choose an area to slow the flow of time down to a crawl. Enemies who enter the field will have their attack rate and speed slowed dramatically. In addition, affected enemies might become held as they are frozen in time. Targets affected by Time Crawl will have the chance to be held increased. Recharge: Very Long
Distortion_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe(-Recharge, -Speed), Chance for Hold
Distortion_Field.display_target_help: The Distortion Field has reduced your Recharge and Movement Speed.
Distortion_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces your targets' Movement and Recharge Speed.

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period. Targets affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful hold, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Long
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You have been held by Time Stop. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Farsight.display_help: You give your allies a brief glimpse of the future and what is to come. This provides you and your team a moderate increase to your chance to hit and defense for a short period of time. Recharge: Very Long
Farsight.display_target_help: You have brief glimpses of the future allowing you to predict your foes' movements. Your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit is increased briefly.
Farsight.display_attacker_hit: You grant your allies the ability to briefly glimpse into the future thus increasing their Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit.
Farsight.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} boosts your Defense, Perception and Chance to Hit with {PowerName}.

Slowed_Response.display_help: You manipulate time around a targeted foe causing their reflexes to become slowed and sluggish. This causes them to have decreased defense and damage resistance. A target affected by Time Crawl will suffer from a more powerful effect. Recharge: Very Long
Slowed_Response.display_target_help: Your defense and resistance has been lowered by Slowed Response.
Slowed_Response.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduces the defenses and resistances of your target and nearby foes.
Slowed_Response.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your defense and resistances with their {PowerName}

Chrono_Shift.display_help: You cause nearby allies to act more quickly by allowing them to slip through the time stream seamlessly. When Chrono Shift is activated, you and nearby allies will immediately recover a portion of your health and endurance. Chrono Shift will greatly increase the Recharge Speed of nearby allies for the duration of the power, additionally for a short while the flow of time will constantly undo a portion of your allies' wounds causing them to periodically recover health and recover endurance. An ally affected by Temporal Selection will recover additional health from Chrono Shift. Chrono Shift will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Very Long
Chrono_Shift.display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +Recharge, Heal, +End, Moderate Healing over Time, +Recovery

Web_Grenade.display_help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast
Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Caltrops.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any enemy that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Caltrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Triage_Beacon.display_help: You can plant a Triage Beacon into the ground. The Beacon is immobile, but it emits a powerful healing aura. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Triage Beacon. The Beacon is invulnerable. Recharge: Very Long

Acid_Mortar.display_help: You can place a small Mortar on the ground. If an enemy passes nearby, the Mortar will fire an Acid grenade at the target. The grenade will explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing minor damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as his Damage Resistance. The mortar will last up to 60 seconds and will fire up to 10 grenades. It can be destroyed by your foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Acid_Mortar.display_short_help: Place Trap: Ranged (AoE), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe -Res(All), -DEF

Force_Field_Generator.display_help: You can build a Force Field Generator Drone. The Drone will generate a Dispersion Bubble that gives all nearby allies increased Defense against all attacks including Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. The Done will follow you and can be buffed and healed or even destroyed like any friendly entity. However, the Drone is not a Henchman and cannot be given commands. You can only ever have one Force Field Generator. Recharge: Very Slow
Force_Field_Generator.display_short_help: Place Drone: PBAoE, Team +DEF, +Res(Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)

Poison_Trap.display_help: You can build a Poison Gas Trap on the ground. Any foes that pass near the Poison Trap will cause it to detonate and release its toxic vapors. The poison is a very noxious gas, and any foes in the affected area may start to choke or even vomit. Affected Foes Regeneration rate and attack rate will be reduced as well. The trap is almost impossible to detect, but it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Trap will detonate. Recharge: Long
Poison_Trap.display_short_help: Place Trap: PBAoE Foe Choke, Vomit, -Regen, -Recharge

Seeker_Drones.display_help: You create two Seeker Drones. These Seeker Drones will follow you until they detect an enemy and then they will zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
Seeker_Drones.display_short_help: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

Trip_Mine.display_help: You can place a Trip Mine on the ground. Any foes that pass near the Trip Mine will cause it to explode, severely damaging all nearby foes and sending them flying. The Trip Mine is almost impossible to detect, but it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Trip Mine will detonate. Setting a mine is delicate work, and if you are interrupted, you will fail. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Trip_Mine.display_short_help: Place Mine: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Knockback

Time_Bomb.display_help: You can place a Time Bomb on the ground. The Time Bomb will detonate 15 seconds after being placed, resulting in a massive explosion that can devastate all nearby foes and send them flying. The Time Bomb is small, and almost impossible to detect. However, it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Bomb will still detonate. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

Entangling_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of your actions. Entangle Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Entangling_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed.

Flash_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Flash_Arrow.display_target_help: The flash of light has left you dazzled. Your chance to hit and range of sight are greatly diminished.

Glue_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue Slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Very Slow

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Poison_Gas_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time, though they will react if attacked. Recharge: Slow

Acid_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Acid_Arrow.display_target_help: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.
Acid_Arrow.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} splashes acid on {PlayerDest}, reducing their resistances to damage.
Acid_Arrow.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with an Acid Arrow. The acid is burning you and reducing your damage resistance.

Disruption_Arrow.display_help: This arrow plants a sonic resonator at a target location. The vibrations of the resonator weaken the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Long
Disruption_Arrow.display_target_help: The Disruption Arrow has lowered your Resistances.

Oil_Slick_Arrow.display_help: On impact, this arrow creates an oil slick that Slows foes in the area and may cause them to slip and fall. The oil slick is very flammable and may burst into flames if fire is used near it. Recharge: Long

EMP_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
EMP_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.
